mapper.select: select so.id orderId,so.main_order_no mainOrderNo,so.order_no orderNo,so.status, so.process_status processStatus, so.unit_code unitCode, so.legal_name legalName, so.legal_entity_id legalEntityId, so.imp_and_exp_type impAndExpType, so.terms, so.order_taker operatorUser, so.receiving_orders_date operatorTime, so.port_departure_code portDepartureCode, sp.name portDeparture, so.port_destination_code portDestinationCode, sp1.name portDestination, so.good_time goodTime, so.is_freight_collect isFreightCollect, so.is_other_expenses_paid isOtherExpensesPaid, so.is_dangerous_goods isDangerousGoods, so.is_charged isCharged, so.create_user createUser, so.create_time createTime, so.update_user, so.update_time, so.need_input_cost, so.unit_department_id unitDepartmentId, so.cabinet_size cabinetSize, so.cabinet_type cabinetType, so.paper_strip_seal paperStripSeal, so.cut_replenish_time cutReplenishTime, so.cabinet_number cabinetNumber, oi.customer_name customerName, oi.id mainOrderId, oi.biz_uname bizName, oi.contract_no contractNo, terms.name termsDesc from sea_order so left join sea_port sp on so.port_departure_code = sp.code left join sea_port sp1 on so.port_destination_code = sp1.code left join order_info oi on so.main_order_no = oi.order_no left join terms on terms.id = so.terms where so.id = #{id}
